title: Update regarding EcoPower Systems
story_body:
EcoPower Systems Updates on Personnel, Marketing, and ESG Initiatives

At 08:00 AM EST, EcoPower Systems (ECO) released a routine update on various company activities. 

In personnel news, EcoPower Systems announced the appointment of Rachel Lee as Director of Sustainability, effective March 15, 2023. Ms. Lee will oversee the company's environmental and social responsibility initiatives. 

Regarding marketing efforts, EcoPower Systems launched a revamped website on February 22, 2023, to improve user experience and provide enhanced product information. The updated website features a redesigned navigation system and additional resources for customers.

On the environmental, social, and governance (ESG) front, EcoPower Systems reported that it has maintained its ISO 14001:2015 certification for environmental management. The company also disclosed its annual ESG report, which outlines progress on sustainability goals, including a 10% reduction in greenhouse gas emissions in 2022 compared to the previous year.

No other material updates were provided by EcoPower Systems in this release.
